participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and weary, Mark often expresses his dissatisfaction with life and seeks change.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i am planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and hardworking, Emma is passionate about her future and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
